results.title: Cameraperson
results.creator_credit: Chicken & Egg Pictures, The Bertha Foundation, Marilyn Ness, Doris Baizley, Kirsten Johnson, Lisa Freedman, Big Mouth Productions and Fork Films
results.brief_description: As a visually radical memoir, CAMERAPERSON draws on the remarkable footage that filmmaker Kirsten Johnson has shot and reframes it in ways that illuminate moments and situations that have personally affected her. What emerges is an elegant meditation on the relationship between truth and the camera frame, as Johnson transforms scenes that have been presented on Festival screens as one kind of truth into another kind of story—one about personal journey, craft, and direct human connection.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Chicken & Egg Pictures, The Bertha Foundation, Marilyn Ness, Doris Baizley, Kirsten Johnson, Lisa Freedman, Big Mouth Productions and Fork Films
results.description: As a visually radical memoir, CAMERAPERSON draws on the remarkable footage that filmmaker Kirsten Johnson has shot and reframes it in ways that illuminate moments and situations that have personally affected her. What emerges is an elegant meditation on the relationship between truth and the camera frame, as Johnson transforms scenes that have been presented on Festival screens as one kind of truth into another kind of story—one about personal journey, craft, and direct human connection.

results.title: Cameramen at War
results.creator_credit: Raymond Glendenning, Realist Films Ltd. and Len Lye
results.brief_description: A tribute to the cameramen of the newsreel companies and the service film units, in the form of a compilation of film of the cameramen themselves, their training and some of their most dramatic film.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Raymond Glendenning, Realist Films Ltd. and Len Lye
results.description: A tribute to the cameramen of the newsreel companies and the service film units, in the form of a compilation of film of the cameramen themselves, their training and some of their most dramatic film.

results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Cabiria
results.brief_description: Cabiria is a 1914 Italian epic silent film, directed by Giovanni Pastrone that laid the foundation for the Hollywood epics that followed. Featuring groundbreaking special effects used to show a volcanic eruption, the film is also famous for inventing the tracking shot.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.

results.description: Young Cabiria is kidnapped by pirates and sold as a slave in Carthage. Just as she’s to be sacrificed to Moloch, Cabiria is rescued by Fulvius Axilla, a good-hearted Roman spy, and his powerful slave, Maciste. The trio are broken up as Cabiria is entrusted to a woman of noble birth. With Cabiria’s fate unknown, Maciste punished for his heroism, and Fulvius sent away to fight for Rome, is there any hope of our heroes reuniting?
description_for_label: Young Cabiria is kidnapped by pirates and sold as a slave in Carthage. Just as she’s to be sacrificed to Moloch, Cabiria is rescued by Fulvius Axilla, a good-hearted Roman spy, and his powerful slave, Maciste. The trio are broken up as Cabiria is entrusted to a woman of noble birth. With Cabiria’s fate unknown, Maciste punished for his heroism, and Fulvius sent away to fight for Rome, is there any hope of our heroes reuniting?

results.title: Bush Mechanics
results.brief_description:
This off-beat series follows the exploits of the Bush Mechanics, a group of engaging Aboriginal characters, as they travel through central Australia.

Combining adventure, magic, realism and a distinctive brand of humour, Bush Mechanics provides an insight into both contemporary and traditional Aboriginal culture.
results.description:

Combining adventure, magic, realism and a distinctive brand of humour, Bush Mechanics provides an insight into both contemporary and traditional Aboriginal culture.

results.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
results.brief_description: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness. She is the Slayer.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.

constellations_other.name: Wild Stallion Mountain: Genre Mash-ups
constellations_other.description: The Bombay Royale are known for combining funk, disco and pop with the sounds of classical Indian music together with the soundtracks of Bollywood cinema. Their music videos similarly hybridise  genres and styles to create intoxicating visual mash-ups.

results.description: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness; to stop the spread of their evil and the swell of their number. She is the Slayer.
description_for_label: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness; to stop the spread of their evil and the swell of their number. She is the Slayer.

results.title: Brick Lane
results.creator_credit: Ruby Films, Film4 Productions, Ingenious Media, Alison Owen, Chris Collins, Laura Jones, Sarah Gavron and Abi Morgan
results.brief_description: The grind of daily life as a Brick Lane Bangladessi as seen through the eyes of Nazneen (Chatterjee), who at 17 enters an arranged marriage with Chanu (Kaushik). Years later, living in east London with her family, she meets a young man Karim (Simpson).

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ruby Films, Film4 Productions, Ingenious Media, Alison Owen, Chris Collins, Laura Jones, Sarah Gavron and Abi Morgan
results.description: The grind of daily life as a Brick Lane Bangladessi as seen through the eyes of Nazneen (Chatterjee), who at 17 enters an arranged marriage with Chanu (Kaushik). Years later, living in east London with her family, she meets a young man Karim (Simpson).

results.title: Breaking Bad
results.creator_credit: Diane Mercer, Bryan Cranston, Sam Catlin, Moira Walley-Beckett, Melissa Bernstein, John Shiban, Patty Lin, Robb Wilson King, Karen Moore, Stewart Lyons, Kathleen Detoro, Thomas Schnauz, George Mastras, Peter Gould, Gran Via Productions, High Bridge Entertainment and Sony Pictures Television Studios
results.brief_description: When Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family’s financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Diane Mercer, Bryan Cranston, Sam Catlin, Moira Walley-Beckett, Melissa Bernstein, John Shiban, Patty Lin, Robb Wilson King, Karen Moore, Stewart Lyons, Kathleen Detoro, Thomas Schnauz, George Mastras, Peter Gould, Gran Via Productions, High Bridge Entertainment and Sony Pictures Television Studios

results.title: Bombshell
results.creator_credit: Norie Varga, Margaret Riley, Charles Randolph, Michelle Graham, Beth Kono, Aaron L. Gilbert, Robert Graf, A.J. Dix, Mark Ricker, Charlize Theron, Jay Roach, Colleen Atwood, Endeavor Content, Lionsgate, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Annapurna Pictures, Bron Studios, Denver and Delilah Productions and Lighthouse Management + Media
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: Bombshell is a revealing look inside the most powerful and controversial media empire of all time; and the explosive story of the women who brought down the infamous man who created it.

constellations_other.name: Elevator Operator: Up and down, the on-screen gift of elevators
constellations_other.description: Inspired by Courtney Barnett playing an elevator operator in her hit song of the same name, we look at how they're used on-screen for comedy, drama and suspense, with the small, confined boxes forcing characters to physically confront each other.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Norie Varga, Margaret Riley, Charles Randolph, Michelle Graham, Beth Kono, Aaron L. Gilbert, Robert Graf, A.J. Dix, Mark Ricker, Charlize Theron, Jay Roach, Colleen Atwood, Endeavor Content, Lionsgate, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Annapurna Pictures, Bron Studios, Denver and Delilah Productions and Lighthouse Management + Media

results.title: Blue Planet II
results.creator_credit: BBC Natural History Unit, BBC and Mark Brownlow
results.brief_description: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

results.creator_credit_for_label: BBC Natural History Unit, BBC and Mark Brownlow
results.description: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.

results.title: Blindspotting
results.creator_credit: Emily Batson and Thomas S. Hammock
results.brief_description: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.description: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning. He and his troublemaking childhood best friend, Miles, work as movers, and when Collin witnesses a police shooting, the two men’s friendship is tested as they grapple with identity and their changed realities in the rapidly-gentrifying neighborhood they grew up in.
description_for_label: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning.
